channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Ivy removal leaves wild area accessible to rough sleepers on Milton Avenue, 17th August
item.description:
Ivy removal leaves wild area accessible to rough sleepers on Milton Avenue. Can someone fix the fence or arrange for some planting please

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 79 Byron Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree roots damaged pavement impossible by mobility scooter Byron Road, 17th August
item.description:
Tree roots damaged pavement impossible by mobility scooter Byron Road. Can someone fix it up please

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 79 Byron Road, Cheltenham

Water leaking from care home boundary and running into street.

item.title: Speeding, 16th August
item.description:
Quite regularly (weekends particularly) we have people speeding up and down whaddon avenue. Could I suggest so.e speed bumps perhaps?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 59 Whaddon Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Speed warning sign obscured by shrubs, 15th August
item.description:
The digital speed warning sign on Old Bath Road is obscured by overgrown shrubs. There are a significant number of cars speeding down and up this road and it really needs to be visible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 349 Old Bath Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Apparent speed limit sign anomalies, 15th August
item.description:
So.....travelling from Dundry nurseries twds the airport and Motorway bridge there is a 30mph sign for about 100 yds that ceases BEFORE reaching the M/way bridge (when it changes to 50) Then coming in the opposite direction (i.e. from the airport) the 30 mph sign applies from before to well after the bridge So in effect travelling in one direction (from right to left on your map) the speed is 50 over the Mway bridge whereas coming in the other direction it is limited to 30. This could be intended but obviously seems strange to the road user. Please confirm
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): M5, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road signage hidden by overgrown hedge, 15th August
item.description:
The signage to the recycling centre is hidden behind an overgrown hedge meaning people drive right past it
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Stoke Road, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Aldi trolley, 15th August
item.description:
I retrieved this from local park area youths have been pushing it around the roads in the area so I have put it at the end of my drive way to avoid the chance of damage/accidents on the road. The basket is detached but easy fix(large disabled cart) it would be good if it could be recovered and put back in use .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 22 Helens Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large tree blocking street light, light to property, risk of damaging property., 15th August
item.description:
The tree in the picture has grown dramatically, it now blocks light from the street light, blocking light to the property and if windy now presents a risk of damaging the property.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 43 Evesham Road, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipped stuff still there four weeks after being reported!, 14th August
item.description:
Next to the fence at number 30 Hicks Beach Road, GL5I 0JW. I reported this fly tipping on 17 July (case reference: 22/03633/FLYTPP) and received a response that it was going to be sorted, but here we are on 14 August and the rubbish is still there. Chlidren are now using the fridge/freezer to hide in for hide and seek games! It needs to be removed quickly before a child ends up in hospital.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 30 Hicks Beach Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water leak, 14th August
item.description:
A fair bit of standing water and flowing as well not sure of the source

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Manor Court, Swindon Village

item.title: Broken bench, 12th August
item.description:
Bench here is significantly damaged and needs repairing

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 5 Parabola Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The road looks to be suffering from subsidence., 12th August
item.description:
I travel this road everyday there is a split appearing horizontal about 1 metre from the kerb and about 3m long. It is after the railway bridge on the way down from Cheltenham racecourse towards bishops cleeve. It seems to be getting longer. And the road is lower between the tear and kerb.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Evesham Road, Prestbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegal parking blocking garage door of Regency Place, 12th August
item.description:
It has been raised by tenants of the building seen on photos (Regency Place Cheltenham) that on several occasions the garage entry has been blocked by cars illegally parked in the entrance. Tenants spoke to the police who said that the rules have changed and now it’s a Council problem. The blocked entry opens to a private parking area of 8-10 vehicles. The tenants suspect that the illegally parked cars belong to the visitors of a nearby AirBnB property.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Duke Of Wellington Court Fishers Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep hole in pavement, 12th August
item.description:
This is quite a deep, if small, hole in the middle of a path and at the end of a drive. Could trip up a pedestrian or disrupt a pushchair or wheelchair. The surrounding pavement is also cracking.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Arkle House, 11 Moorend Park Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Faulty green/red man display, 11th August
item.description:
The green/red man on the island between the bus lane and main carriageway, on the Westbound A40, at the Hubble road junction. It sometimes doesn’t display either the green or the red man and is just blank. This feels like a safety issue. Specifically it seems to be blank when the other two ‘repeaters’ show a Red man.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 55 Whittington Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown bushes on footpath to new HSL school, 11th August
item.description:
This footpath will be a route to the new High School Leckhampton starting 05/09/2022. 11 & 12 year old children walking to school. The bushes need cutting back so that the route is safer for kids when passing other walkers/large dogs

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Robinswood Cottage Kidnappers Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown path for primary HSL school walk, 10th August
item.description:
This footpath across Lotts Meadow (connecting Burrows Frield to Kidnappers Lane) is overgrown but will be a primary walking route for 11 & 12 year old children to High School Leckhampton from 05/09/2022. The current path isn’t wide enough for children to move away from large dogs.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Bungalow Kidnappers Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees overgrown on new HSL school route, 10th August
item.description:
Low overhanging/overgrown tree obstructing pathway on bridge joining Burrows Field and Lotts Meadow. The will be a primary route for 11&12 year old children for the new High School Leckhampton starting on 05/09/2022

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 109 Church Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
